value.name: Election 2021: Parsippany Township Council Candidate Gary Martin
value.description: In a few short weeks the first wave in election season 2021 reaches the Garden State and Patch has asked local candidates to share their  thoughts before the June 8 primary election. Patch sent out emails to all candidates to the email addresses listed for their campaign provided to the office of the clerk.

value.name: Gunman kills eight, self at FedEx warehouse in Indianapolis: police
value.description: ILLINOIS, Feb. 15, 2019 — Gary Martin, 45, opened fire at an Illinois factory after receiving notice of termination from his job there, killing five workers and wounding five policemen before he ...

value.name: Factbox: Major mass shootings in the United States
value.description: At least eight people were killed and an unknown number wounded in a shooting in a light rail yard in San Jose, California, early on Wednesday morning by a gunman who was killed at the scene, officials said.

value.name: Sacked US man kills five co-workers, wounds five police
value.description: Police named the suspect as Gary Martin, 45, of Aurora. He was a 15-year employee of the company and "information that we have indicates that he was being terminated today," said Aurora Police ...

value.name: A year after George Floyd’s death, his family meets with Biden, lawmakers
value.description: Family members of George Floyd met Tuesday with lawmakers on Capitol Hill and President Joe Biden at the White House on the one-year anniversary of his death in police custody.

value.name: Operation “Rocket Fuel”: State Grand Jury indicts 26 people following wiretap investigation
value.description: SC Attorney General Alan Wilson announced today that the SC State Grand Jury has issued indictments of 26 people for their alleged participation in a drug trafficking conspiracy involving heroin and methamphetamine but also other illegal narcotics.

value.name: 'I Want a Lawyer': Black Attorney Advises His Children on Police Encounters
